addItemToPouchComboxWarning: Please make sure the item can be added to the POUCH, this MOD will not check!
addItemToPouchInput: Enter the Item ID [You can directly input the item ID]
addItemToPouchWarning:
Added items will appear in your POUCH, please use the in-game AUTO-SORT to automatically send the items to the box.
It is normal for some items added to the POUCH via Item Add not to display correctly because these items were never meant to be in the POUCH!
After adding them, please use the in-game AUTO-SORT to automatically transfer the newly added items from the POUCH to the Item Box.
Since the Item Box UI in MHWS may not refresh immediately, please close and reopen the Item Box UI after using Item Add to manually refresh it!
